result.purpose: This folder is responsible for housing the main page components of the application, specifically for user interactions and data collection.
result.architecture: The folder follows a component-based architecture typical of React applications, where each file represents a self-contained component managing its own state and behavior.

src/pages/RecipientProfile.js.purpose: A React component for collecting recipient profile information.
side_effects: Updates state based on user input
Triggers onProfileComplete callback on form submission
